source.sqlReaderQuery: select max (ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from salesLT.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_High_WaterMark_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_Last_Modified_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select C.Firstname, C.MiddleName,C.LastName, CA.AddressLine1,CA.AddressLine2
From [SalesLT].[Customer] as C 
Left Join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] as A 
On C.[CustomerID] = A.[CustomerID]
Left Join [SalesLT].[Address] as CA
On A.[AddressID] = CA.[AddressID]
Order BY 5 DESC

Select count (*) as RecordCount
From SalesLT.Address

Select count (*) as RecordCount
From SalesLT.Product

Select count (*) as RecordCount
From SalesLT.Product

Select count (*) as RecordCount
from Saleslt.Customer

SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT'
